lead_paragraph: Barcelona have agreed to buy France centre back Samuel Umtiti from Olympique Lyon for 25 millions euros, the Spanish club said on its Twitter account on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Barcelona Agree With Lyon on Umtiti Transfer
headline.main: Barcelona Agree With Lyon on Umtiti Transfer

snippet: Barcelona have agreed to buy France centre back Samuel Umtiti from Olympique Lyon for 25 millions euros, the Spanish club said on its Twitter account on Thursday....
